a1: I feel like they havent done their best recently.
q2: I don't think Liverpool has been that bad.
a2: with salah and mane i think this year the liverpool win a few trophies
q3: No kidding, not to mention Daniel Sturridge, one of the best forwards in the league on their side
a3: Do you feel that Sturridge will get any starts this year?
q4: It's possible, he seems to have the attitude to work for it.
q5: What are the biggest hurdles for Liverpool next season?
a5: They have to improve their teamwork, for one.
